title: Surprising Darcy
description: In the mood for something short and sinfully sweet? Don't miss Surprising Darcy by New York Times bestselling author Selena Blake writing as Gillian Blakely. Two months ago Darcy Evans had a little too much to drink and admitted one of her most secret fantasies... to have two men at once. Today is her 29th birthday and her boyfriend, Aiden Sinclair, is ready to help her celebrate. In fact, he thinks he has the perfect surprise in store.
author: Selena Blake
